error: {"error":{"message":"(#200) If posting to a group, requires app being installed in the group, and \\\n          either publish_to_groups permission with user token, or both pages_read_engagement \\\n          and pages_manage_posts permission with page token; If posting to a page, \\\n          requires both pages_read_engagement and pages_manage_posts as an admin with \\\n          sufficient administrative permission","type":"OAuthException","code":200,"fbtrace_id":"A0H7rIu19gi1kM0mL_zf8fC"}}
